org.cougaar.lib.web.service
Interface RootServletService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
public interface RootServletService
extends Service

This service is the root-level ServletService, for use each agent's LeafServletServiceComponent to advertise the ServletService.

The API is identical, but kept separate to allow early-loading components to find the correct intra-agent ServletService.
